title: Set Up Equation For Problem
text: Let the height of the triangle be h, we can write the base of the triangle in terms of h as $$4+2h$$.

title: Equation For Triangle Area
text: Area of $$triangle=\frac{1}{2} base height$$. We can set up the equation using given condition as $$120=\frac{1}{2} h \left(4+2h\right)$$.

title: Solve For Unknown Using Quadratic Formula
